Body:
colour_wrappers = [(Colours.END, Colours.black), (Colours.BLUE, Colours.
    blue), (Colours.BOLD, Colours.bold), (Colours.CYAN, Colours.cyan), (
    Colours.DARKCYAN, Colours.darkcyan), (Colours.GREEN, Colours.green), (
    Colours.PURPLE, Colours.purple), (Colours.RED, Colours.red), (Colours.
    UNDERLINE, Colours.underline), (Colours.YELLOW, Colours.yellow)]
for colour, wrapper in colour_wrappers:
    text1 = Colours._wrap_colour('test', colour)
    text2 = wrapper('test')
    assert text1.split('test') == [colour, Colours.END]
    assert text2.split('test') == [colour, Colours.END]
